metadata.Title: CVE-2010-1677 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
MHonArc 2.6.16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via start tags that are placed within other start tags, as demonstrated by a <bo<bo<bo<bo<body>dy>dy>dy>dy> sequence, a different vulnerability than CVE-2010-4524.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-1677` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mhonarc - 2.6.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mhonarc package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.18-1').
